scripts.build: (ls lit 2>/dev/null || npm run monorepo:init) && npm run build:generate
scripts.build:watch: chokidar 'lit/packages/*/src/**/*.ts' -c 'npm run monorepo:build && npm run build:generate' --initial
scripts.monorepo:init: npm run monorepo:clone && npm run monorepo:install && npm run monorepo:build
scripts.monorepo:clone: git clone https://github.com/Polymer/lit-html --branch lit-next lit && cd lit && git checkout $(cat ../lit.sha)
scripts.monorepo:update: cd lit && git checkout lit-next && git pull && git rev-parse HEAD > ../lit.sha && npm run monorepo:install && npm run monorepo:build
scripts.monorepo:install: cd lit && npm ci && npm run bootstrap
scripts.monorepo:build: cd lit && npx lerna run build:ts --scope lit --include-dependencies
